Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Name: Hydrogen
short description: Hydrogen is the global fintech enablement platform.
Brief_description: Hydrogen is the global fintech enablement platform. Hydrogen's SaaS platform consists of ONE connected set of configurable no-code apps & APIs, ONE integration library, and ONE standardized data model. Hydrogen cuts the cost and time to market for fintech apps and components by 80% or more!  Hydrogen has been honored with over a dozen awards, including World Changing Technology from Fast Company, Mastercard Start Path, Fintech Startup of the Year from KPMG Luxembourg, and was the winner of the BBVA Open Talent USA competition.
